VIEW_SOURCE: CREATE ALGORITHM=UNDEFINED DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` SQL SECURITY DEFINER VIEW `v_pengaman` AS select `aa`.`id` AS `id`,`aa`.`id_bukuinduk` AS `id_bukuinduk`,`aa`.`idbi_awal` AS `idbi_awal`,`aa`.`tgl_pengamanan` AS `tgl_pengamanan`,`aa`.`tambah_aset` AS `tambah_aset`,`aa`.`jenis_pengamanan` AS `jenis_pengamanan`,`aa`.`uraian_kegiatan` AS `uraian_kegiatan`,`aa`.`pengaman_instansi` AS `pengaman_instansi`,`aa`.`pengaman_alamat` AS `pengaman_alamat`,`aa`.`surat_no` AS `surat_no`,`aa`.`surat_tgl` AS `surat_tgl`,`aa`.`biaya_pengamanan` AS `biaya_pengamanan`,`aa`.`ket` AS `ket`,`aa`.`tgl_update` AS `tgl_update`,`aa`.`uid` AS `uid`,`aa`.`tgl_perolehan` AS `tgl_perolehan`,`bb`.`a1` AS `a1`,`bb`.`a` AS `a`,`bb`.`b` AS `b`,`bb`.`c1` AS `c1`,`bb`.`c` AS `c`,`bb`.`d` AS `d`,`bb`.`e` AS `e`,`bb`.`e1` AS `e1`,`bb`.`f1` AS `f1`,`bb`.`f2` AS `f2`,`bb`.`f` AS `f`,`bb`.`g` AS `g`,`bb`.`h` AS `h`,`bb`.`i` AS `i`,`bb`.`j` AS `j`,`bb`.`noreg` AS `noreg`,`bb`.`thn_perolehan` AS `thn_perolehan`,`bb`.`kondisi` AS `kondisi`,`bb`.`status_barang` AS `status_barang`,`bb`.`tgl_sensus` AS `tgl_sensus`,`bb`.`tgl_buku` AS `tgl_buku`,`bb`.`tahun_sensus` AS `tahun_sensus`,`bb`.`staset` AS `staset`,`bb`.`verifikasi` AS `verifikasi`,`cc`.`nm_barang` AS `nm_barang` from ((`pengamanan` `aa` left join `buku_induk` `bb` on((`aa`.`id_bukuinduk` = `bb`.`id`))) left join `ref_barang` `cc` on(((`bb`.`f` = `cc`.`f`) and (`bb`.`g` = `cc`.`g`) and (`bb`.`h` = `cc`.`h`) and (`bb`.`i` = `cc`.`i`) and (`bb`.`j` = `cc`.`j`))))
